rows.label: tev000901_MSG0001
rows.name: Are you a BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG0002
rows.name:
I am Bozé Lowes, of the Harriers.
Some call me the Harrier Hammer, for my fists
pound any deviation straight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG0003
rows.name:
When we're battling demons to protect humanity,
sometimes we all step off the path of enlightenment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG0004
rows.name:
And that's when I come around to beat the dharma
into you! Ah ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1001
rows.name: It's a day full of hope in a world full of hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1002
rows.name: What do you need? Shall I grant you my strength?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Bozé to your team.

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Bozé's request for now.

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1003
rows.name:
Then let us get started. There is much wisdom I have
to beat into that thick skull of yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1004
rows.name:
Very well. If you need me, I will be here aligning my
heart chakra.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1009
rows.name:
I've heard that the four of you are going to recover an
alien mech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1010
rows.name:
No matter how much faith you hold that the indigens
will not react to your mimeosomes, I urge you to stay
wary. You never know what might transpire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1015
rows.name:
Rescuing brethren in peril is our first duty as BLADEs,
so we should depart for Oblivia immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1016
rows.name:
I will tear the Ganglion asunder with my dharmic
might, so you must allow me to accompany you!
Kaaaatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0031
rows.name: Add Bozé to your team.

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0041
rows.name: Decline Bozé's request for now.

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1017
rows.name:
We've no time to lose—I'll not sacrifice a single BLADE
to those demons![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1018
rows.name:
Very well. If you need me, I will be here aligning my
heart chakra.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1023
rows.name:
Your next mission is to search for a section of the
Lifehold?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1024
rows.name:
I can help you in this, if you would have me.
We have little time left in these bodies, after all, so let
us hope that the next piece of the Lifehold is the core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0051
rows.name: Add Bozé to your team.

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline Bozé's request for now.

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1025
rows.name:
Then let us be off! We shall be the light that illuminates
the glorious true path of mankind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1026
rows.name:
Very well. If you need me, I will be here aligning my
heart chakra.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1031
rows.name: I sense strange spirits in this land they call Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1032
rows.name:
Shall I join you, that I might pacify the spirits by
meditating on the Amitabha Buddha?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0071
rows.name: Add Bozé to your team.

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline Bozé's request for now.

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1033
rows.name:
Then let us be off! We shall be the light that illuminates
the glorious true path of mankind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1034
rows.name:
Very well. If you need me, I will be here aligning my
heart chakra.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1039
rows.name:
All men stray from the path of enlightenment at times.
It is what they do next that matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1040
rows.name:
This is the lesson that I shall teach to Lao,
once I have imbued it upon my fists.
Will you allow me to give it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0091
rows.name: Add Bozé to your team.

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline Bozé's request for now.

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1041
rows.name:
One way or the other, Lao, I shall introduce the
dharma to your mislaid soul.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1042
rows.name: Very well. Then I entrust this duty to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1047
rows.name:
Form is emptiness. Emptiness is form.
This is the task entrusted to we few remaining humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1048
rows.name:
It is a task I would very much like to complete.
I can depart immediately, if you are willing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0111
rows.name: Add Bozé to your team.

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline Bozé's request for now.

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1049
rows.name:
Then come Naraka or high water,
we go to the Lifehold Core![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1050
rows.name: Very well. I entrust this duty to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1055
rows.name:
We may have recovered the Lifehold Core,
but there remains much that I must teach you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1056
rows.name:
If you intend to continue exploring this world,
then I should come along as your spiritual guide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0131
rows.name: Add Bozé to your team.

rows.label: tev000901_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000901_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline Bozé's request for now.

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1057
rows.name:
Then let us get started. There is much wisdom I have
to beat into that thick skull of yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000901_MSG1058
rows.name:
Very well. If you need me, I will be here aligning my
heart chakra.[ST:wait ]
